Html:
Dear Sirs,

I have the following HTML line code in my document:

<v:image xmlns:v="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml" id="theImage" style='behavior: url(#default#VML); display:inline-block;position:absolute; height:79px; width:567px;top:0;left:0;border:0;z-index:1;' src="http://www.xyz.com" />

I need to extract the node collection of these "v:image" tags (since I need to change the src attribute).

With html image tag I used for instance this one: HtmlNodeCollection images = doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//img[@src]");

What should I do with v:image ?

Many thanks in advance and Best Regards.

Sergio
